backend/main.mo: Defines transaction types, balances, stats, user profiles, and access control logic with maps for storing transactions, deductions, and opening balances.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing Monthly Transactions UI fixes with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior in the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root container and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Handles PIN authentication flow, initializes app state, and renders either the auth screen or the dashboard based on login status.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestore.ts: Component providing UI and logic for backing up and restoring data via JSON files with success and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCards.tsx: Displays balance overview cards with loading and error states and supports navigation to preselected transaction types.
frontend/src/components/DailyTracking.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/DaywiseTransacti: Renders daily transactions with date selection, local storage deductions, and derived calculations. Fetches all transactions and displays totals and user-entered deductions.
frontend/src/components/EditTransactionD: Provides a dialog to edit an existing transaction, preloading data and submitting updates through a mutation. Handles type, amount, description, and date changes.
frontend/src/components/FilterTransactio: Filters transactions by date range and aggregates cash-in, UPI-in, and deductions using local storage. Displays computed stats for each day within the selected range.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer showing branding and a link to caffeine.ai with a decorative heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding and authenticated actions like backup, restore, and clearing data. Includes tooltips, file upload handling, and logout support.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTransacti: Shows monthly transactions with type filters, search, and merged derived rows. Fetches all transactions and filters them by month, type, and text.
frontend/src/components/OpeningBalancesF: Form component to load, display, edit, and save opening cash, UPI, savings, and deduction balances with date selection.
frontend/src/components/PinAuth.tsx: Handles PIN setup and verification flow with UI states, validation, and reset logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
Form for creating transactions with type selection, amount, description, date, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays all transactions with filtering, edit/delete dialogs, and derived row handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and managing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinAuth.ts: Provides PIN-based local auth with setup, verification, session restore, and reset using hashed PINs in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks and helpers for transactions, balances, user data, and opening balances with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, gradients, animations, and UI overrides for calendars and dropdowns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard UI with tab-based navigation for overview, adding transactions, history, filtering, and date-based views.
frontend/src/utils/derivedTransactions.t: Generates and merges derived transaction rows like savings and deductions using localStorage data.
Determines transaction direction and returns consistent color and icon classes based on type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS content paths, theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, including known issues and existing feature requirements for fixing a blank screen bug.
